description.value:
You learn the @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-cantrips.58I1UTE8ZV4CJ5W6]{Adherent Ember} cantrip, and Intelligence, Wisdom, or Presence is your spellcasting attribute for it.

If you already knew the @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-cantrips.58I1UTE8ZV4CJ5W6]{Adherent Ember} cantrip before selecting this Archetype or later learn it from another source, you instead gain proficiency with one of the following: sling, slingshot, or the Pathfinding Trade.

system.requirements: 3rd level overall and have at least one level each in a Martial and Spellcaster class
